word_mean: 肝硬变：病理特征为失去正常的小叶微观结构，且有纤维变性及结节状再生的肝脏疾病
硬变：此术语有时指任何器官的慢性间质性炎症

sentence.Network_en: Cirrhosis deaths, in both males and females increased during the same years.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这些年里,不论男女,因肝硬化而死亡的人数也同时增加.

sentence.Network_en: The typical patient has obvious signs of advanced nutritional cirrhosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 典型的病人有明显的晚期营养性肝硬变的体症.

sentence.Network_en: It has a higher incidence in postnecrotic cirrhosis and hemochromatosis than in Laennec's cirrhosis.
sentence.Network_cn: 坏死后肝硬变及血色素沉着症引起的肝癌比门脉性肝硬变所引起者为多.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...③慢性重型肝炎：在慢性肝炎或肝硬化病变基础上出现亚大块或大块坏死，大部分病例尚可见桥接及碎屑状坏死。（4）肝炎肝硬化（cirrhosis）：①活动性肝硬化：肝硬化伴明显炎症，假小叶边界不清；.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek kirrhos 'tawny' (because this is the colour of the liver in many cases)

entry.tran: (常由过量饮酒引起的)肝硬化
entry.def: Cirrhosis or cirrhosis of the liver is a disease which destroys a person's liver and which can kill them. It is often caused by drinking too much alcohol.

means.word_mean: 1. a chronic disease interfering with the normal functioning of the liver; the major cause is chronic alcoholism

auth_sentence.content: Symptoms of cirrhosis Cirrhosis may not cause any symptoms.
auth_sentence.res_content: Symptoms of cirrhosis Cirrhosis may not cause any symptoms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Symptoms of cirrhosis Cirrhosis may not cause any symptoms.

auth_sentence.content: Over many years, this can lead to scarring and cirrhosis.

auth_sentence.content: Certain people with cirrhosis shouldn't postpone treatment, doctors say.
